caseTitle: Action on the news clipping published in Daily Pakistan dated 17.04.2013
tagline: The Court, in the matter of action taken on news clipping regarding unprecedented load shedding in the country, issues notice to all provincial Chief Secretaries for giving reaction if the supplies from the National Grid and the Sui Gas are ensured in bulk  by the respective agencies as per their requirements, making them responsible to ensure equitable supply of the electricity and the gas to the consumers of all categories and the Federal Government may deduct, in advance, the charges/price through the NFC.
